Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students who are trying to communicate with each other over a long distance.
The student can include a string telephone in the drawing, showing how sound is used to send information.
The student can demonstrate how only the materials provided (string and cups, for example) are used to build the device.
The student can show that the string telephone covers a specific distance between the two students.
The student can illustrate how the string is pulled tight between the cups to allow sound to travel effectively.
The student can depict the way this device helps people communicate over a distance.
The student can identify and label the parts of the string telephone in the drawing (such as cups, string).
The student can demonstrate through the drawing that the device works using sound, as sound travels along the string.
